trans-unit.source: Provides colors used for Microsoft Office display elements.
trans-unit.target: 提供用於 Microsoft Office 色彩顯示項目。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class is called by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體稱為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得核取按鈕時所使用之漸層開始色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the starting color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是核取按鈕時所使用漸層開始色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得核取按鈕時所使用漸層結束色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the end color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是核取按鈕時所使用之漸層的結束色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the middle color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得核取按鈕時所使用漸層的中間色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the middle color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是核取按鈕時所使用漸層的中間色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the solid color used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得核取按鈕時所使用的純色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the solid color used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是所使用的純色核取按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border color to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonCheckedHighlight*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得要用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonCheckedHighlight*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonCheckedHighlight*>的框線色彩

trans-unit.target: 取得要搭配使用的框線色彩<> *>， <> </> *>，以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientEnd*>色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientEnd*>

trans-unit.target: 取得要核取按鈕且所使用漸層時，使用的純色。

trans-unit.source: Gets the color to use for shadow effects on the grip (move handle).
trans-unit.target: 取得要用於 （移動控點） 的底框陰影效果的色彩。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> must be set to `true` for this color to be displayed.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref> rather than colors that match the current visual style.

trans-unit.source: If visual styles or themes are turned off, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> uses the colors in <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.
trans-unit.target: 如果視覺化樣式或主題已關閉，請<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>中的色彩</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
